title: Epic 7: Verify index parity and performance
description: All scenarios pass, benchmarks meet targets, parity clean.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

custom.beads_notes:
Plan: 1) Run index benchmark scripts for Python and Rust (debug and release). 2) Run spec parity check and any index-related tests. 3) Compare results to targets and document gaps. 4) Close if criteria met or leave open with next steps.
Ran index benchmarks and parity/tests. Python build ~69.56ms, cache load ~7.28ms vs target 50ms/50ms; Rust release build ~50.02ms, cache load ~5.21ms vs target 1ms/1ms. Spec parity: Feature steps 73, Python 73, Rust 73. Tests: python -m pytest python/tests/test_index.py, cargo test --test index. Criteria not met due to performance targets.
